cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0.2)
project(roar_msgs)

find_package(catkin REQUIRED COMPONENTS
  message_generation
  roscpp
  rospy
  std_msgs
  geometry_msgs
)

 add_message_files(
   FILES
   LandmarkArray.msg
   ModeCommand.msg
   ModuleStatus.msg
   StateCommand.msg
 )

 generate_messages(
   DEPENDENCIES
   std_msgs
   geometry_msgs
 )

catkin_package(
  CATKIN_DEPENDS 
  message_runtime 
  roscpp 
  rospy 
  std_msgs
  geometry_msgs
)

include_directories(
  ${catkin_INCLUDE_DIRS}
)
